newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Lai Sun to raise HK$1 bln in China spin-off - paper.
newsitem.headline: Lai Sun to raise HK$1 bln in China spin-off - paper.

text.p: Lai Sun Development Co Ltd is expected to raise about HK$1 billion for working capital from the flotation of its China property arm, Lai Fung Holdings Ltd, in Hong Kong, a newspaper reported on Saturday.

Lai Sun Development's director and senior vice-president Julius Lau, who was in Guangzhou, was quoted in the South China Morning Post as saying the proposed spin-off was expected to be completed in September.
The investment holding and property development company was not immediately available for comment.
For the financial year to July, Lai Fung made a net profit of HK$90 million, the paper said.
In 1994, Lai Sun Development issued US$150 million in bonds, convertible into shares of Lai Fung, to fund its property activities in China and Hong Kong.
